item.title: U.S. Treasury Sanctions 19 Myanmar, Cambodia Entities for Forcing Trafficking Victims into Crypto Scams
item.description:
The U.S. Treasury Department sanctioned 19 entities across Myanmar and Cambodia for operating massive crypto scam networks that defrauded Americans of over $10 billion in 2024 alone, targeting transnational criminal organizations using forced labor and human trafficking to perpetrate "pig butchering" scams through debt bondage, violence, and forced prostitution threats.
